com.mapgroup.client

Class TreeClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • java.applet.Applet
            • javax.swing.JApplet
              • com.mapgroup.client.TreeClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer

    public class TreeClient
extends javax.swing.JApplet
    Main class for the client-side of the application, by which the user can query its server with an applet or a desktop application.

    This class provides all the services that the user need to communicate with the server. The client can be execute both from a web page and from an executable jar. It is possible to specify some parameters to properly set up the connection with the server, or they can be ignored for default settings. The class provides a GUI to make the interaction as intuitive and comfortable as possible.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  TreeClient.FileConverter
      Class that provides all the services needed to convert a dataset from a format to another.
      class  TreeClient.MailPanel
      Provides all the services to send an email to one or many addressees with the report of the last prediction.
      (package private) class  TreeClient.MyTableModel
      This class represents a model for the table adopted to represent all the attributes for a specific dataset and their values.
      private class  TreeClient.MyTablePanel
      This class models the panel in which will be contained the attributes' table representation needed for the predicting process
      private class  TreeClient.RadioListener
      Class to manage events on the radio buttons in response of user's choice.

      • dbPredictionSession

        private void dbPredictionSession(java.lang.String treeSrc)
        Starts a prediction loading the tree from a database table.

        If the tree has been correctly loaded the user will be asked to save it on a file on the server, for faster future interrogations.

      • fileChooser_mouseClicked

        private void fileChooser_mouseClicked()
        Displays a file chooser where the user can select which file upload to the server.

        A request is made to the server to know which extensions are supported. The supported extensions may change during application life cycle.

      • filePredictionSession

        private void filePredictionSession()
        Starts a prediction loading the tree from a server's dataset.

      • getFileList

        private java.lang.String[] getFileList()
        Asks the server for the list of available files that can be chosen by the user.
        Returns:
        the list of available files

      • init

        public void init()
        Set-up the connection with server and start the client as a a web applet.

        Check whether specified parameters are correct or not. If they are valid starts the connection with the server and provides the GUI for the user. If they are incorrect a connection with the default settings is started.

        Overrides:
        init in class java.applet.Applet

      • initConnection

        private void initConnection()
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Starts the connection with server, looking up for the server remote object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if occurred some errors in starting connection with server
        java.rmi.NotBoundException

      • initGUI

        private void initGUI(java.awt.Container cp)
        Initialize the GUI for the user.
        Parameters:
        cp - Container in which all the elements will be drawn

      • initPredictionState

        private void initPredictionState()
        Resets some buttons and labels in the GUI to start a prediction.

      • initServerParameter

        private void initServerParameter(java.lang.String host,
                       int port)
        Initialize some fields of the class with the parameters necessary to set-up the connection with the server.
        Parameters:
        host - IP or DNS of the server
        port - number of the port for connection

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Set-up the connection with server and start the client as a desktop application.

        Check whether specified parameters are correct or not. If they are valid starts the connection with the server and provides the GUI for the user. If they are incorrect a connection with the default settings is started.

        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments

      • predictBt_mouseClicked

        private void predictBt_mouseClicked()
        Sends to the server the user's choices for the available attributes.

        When the prediction is over then shows a message to the user with the predicted value, otherwise asks for further options.

      • resetTablePanel

        void resetTablePanel()
        Hides and re-initializes the table panel when it is needed anymore

      • treeConstructionBt_mouseClicked

        private void treeConstructionBt_mouseClicked()

      • uploadPredictionSession

        private void uploadPredictionSession(java.lang.String treeSrc)
        Checks whether the file selected by the user is valid or not. If it is valid then asks for a captcha confirmation and send the file to the server.

        If the tree has been correctly built the user will be asked to save it on a file on the server, for faster future interrogations.
